channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A Utah church embarks on a healing journey in the aftermath of the Kirk assassination
item.description: A church in Orem, Utah, the city where Charlie Kirk was killed, brings healing during its Sunday service. "We're going to be navigating this as a comm...

item.title: In first interview, Pope Leo XIV takes on billionaires, polarization and war
item.description: Pope Leo XIV reflected on the legacy of Pope Francis and whether he sees himself as more U.S. American or Peruvian.

item.title: To save its rare birds, New Zealand is relying on a nation of backyard trappers
item.description: New Zealand's unique birds are at risk of extinction, like the kiwi. So the country is trying to eradicate the invasive species that prey on them. Eve...

item.title: What we know about the suspect arrested in Charlie Kirk's killing. And, Emmy takeaways

item.title: Democrats will 'either adapt or die' as strategists push them onto new platforms

item.title: Men jailed for attempting to bewitch and kill Zambia's president
item.description: The pair were sentenced to two years in prison after being found with charms, including a chameleon.

item.title: U.S. and China have "framework" of TikTok deal as Trump teases agreement
item.description: "We have a framework for a TikTok deal," Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said after talks with Chinese officials in Spain.

item.title: Conor McGregor ends bid to be Irish president
item.description: The MMA fighter says the decision comes after "careful reflection" and consultation with his family.

item.title: What can be done to slow misinformation in the digital age

item.title: Hudson Westbrook on debut album "Texas Forever"

item.title: China accuses Nvidia of violating anti-monopoly laws
item.description: The accusation comes as the US and China hold talks to de-escalate the trade war between the two.

item.title: Netanyahu does not rule out further strikes on Hamas leaders
item.description: At a joint press conference with US Secretary of State Marco Rubio, Netanyahu said every country had the right "to defend itself beyond its borders".

item.title: 7 killed in another mass shooting at a pool hall in Ecuador
item.description: The attack was the fourth of its kind in recent weeks in the South American country.

item.title: US says 'framework' for TikTok ownership deal agreed with China
item.description: The deal will pave the way to US ownership of the social media platform' s American operations, according to the US treasury secretary.
